title: Neowaui Yeoreumbam
overview: Reality show about holiday romances. Lately it has become hard to travel or love. Romance manager Jella invites single guys and girls into her house who want to get away from the daily grind. They will spend 4 days and 3 nights together. Romance, which you can only dream of, awaits them on a summer night. A dating show as hot as midsummer. Are they destined for each other? Or is it a one night stand? Remake of the British reality show Love Island (2005).
